Package inha.git.question.api.service

Class QuestionServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
inha.git.question.api.service.QuestionServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
QuestionService
@Service @Transactional(readOnly=true) public class QuestionServiceImpl extends Object implements QuestionService
QuestionServiceImpl은 question 관련 비즈니스 로직을 처리.
